# Urinalysis Sample Collection Services
Government of Canada Tender Announcement

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

**Notice Type Description**: This tender announcement is for the provision of Urinalysis Sample Collection Services to the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) in Halifax Regional Municipality and Kentville, Nova Scotia.

**Background**
The CSC requires a contractor to provide urinalysis sample collection services on an as-needed basis for offenders released on community supervision. The contractor will be responsible for collecting and forwarding samples to laboratories for testing.

**Objectives**
The contractor must provide urinalysis sample collection services during the contract period, as per Commissioner's Directive 566-10, CCRA Article 55-57, and CCRR Article 60 to 62; 65 to 72 (A & B) inclusive.

**Deliverables**
The contractor must provide the following:
* Monthly roll-up reports
* Complete and submit all work, documentation, and reports in English

**Contract Period**
The contract period is from June 1, 2023, to May 31, 2024, with an option to renew for two additional one-year periods.

**Security Requirements**
This contract includes security requirements, as specified in the solicitation document.

**Solicitation Document**
The complete solicitation document and associated documents are available for download on Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.

**Procurement Method**
This procurement is conducted through competitive open bidding.
